text: AH Ryan, you saying this about HubSpot.extend made me realise what I've done. It's now working!! Thanks so much for your time and pointing me in the right direction :smile::pray:

<@U07U7RVH18V> that's always one of the trickier parts for folks, where "standard react" code meets the HubSpot specific bits (like `HubSpot.extend`). Is there anything else I can help with? Or if there was a particular thing that tripped you up?

<@U07EHBPLGLA> thanks for following up and also reporting the issue earlier. We have identified the root cause and the team that is taking this up and addressing this at the moment.

In the meantime, if it's not a lot to ask, would it be possible for you to also create a support ticket? You can reference the details of this conversation there.
This would be the best way to keep you informed of the status.
Is there anyway around the Sales or Service Hub Enterprise requirement for building UI Extensions?
I can understand limiting the amount of extensions a pro might be able to build - but no pro account can build an extension?
